mapper.update: update tp_apply_card set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, mobile, idcard, area, add_time, user_id from tp_apply_card
mapper.delete: delete from tp_apply_card where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select id, name, mobile, idcard, area, add_time, user_id from tp_apply_card where id = #{id}
